title: If a wife is murdered by her husband, should she be buried under her maiden name? - Quora

response.answer_text: That would be up to her family or whoever is responsible for burying her. Many times the family will choose yo bury her under ber maiden name, but there is no law covering this matter. It's a choice only her family can make.

Most definitely. I would not place my daughter under the name. Thats B. S. Would not be happening if he was the that took my daughters life.. Not only that but his name would not be in the obitauery. In my soul his name is dead to me and so is he!
